page.title: 06BROADTOWN CHURCH.
page.content: {Christchurch}Broad Town was built in {1844}& opened{12th}April 1845.Before that people went to{Clyffe Pypard or {Broad Hinton.}The first{vicar}was the {Rev.William Farley}he is buried in the{graveyard. On Sunday mornings they hold a service at{10.45am}& on the{3rd}Sunday in a month they have{Evensong}at {6.00pm}as well. Just before{Christmas they have a{carol}service & a{midnight service but thats only{1 year}out of{3 {years}& a service on{Christmas morning. The last vicar was the{Rev. {J. Hopkins}who left at{Easter 1985}he was also vicar of{Clyffe Pypard}& {Tockenham.}The new vicar will be{Rev. {C. Moorsom.}The caretaker is Mrs. {Shapland.}Theres a rota of{ladies}who do the{flowers. The village school holds Harvest Festival & Nativity plays there.
